projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills, built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: E-Learning Platform
projects.description: A full-stack application for students and teachers to interact, manage courses, and schedule classes. Built using MERN stack.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A productivity app to manage daily tasks with features like deadlines, reminders, and categories, built with Next.js and TypeScript.

projects.title: E-Commerce Store
projects.description: An e-commerce store with features like product listings, shopping cart, and payments integration using Stripe.

projects.title: Blog Platform
projects.description: A platform for users to write and publish blog posts with features like user authentication, commenting, and tags.
